CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Families relative to Urban Dwellers?
SRP.A: Families is {above} Urban Dwellers in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Urban Dwellers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Young Adults}.

VE.Q: What is Students's Technology Adoption Rate in 2005?
VE.A: Students's technology adoption rate in 2005 is {2.55} %.

VE.Q: What is Rural Communities's Technology Adoption Rate in 1996?
VE.A: Rural Communities's technology adoption rate in 1996 is {35.07} %.

VE.Q: What is Families's Technology Adoption Rate in 1986?
VE.A: Families's technology adoption rate in 1986 is {20.18} %.

VE.Q: What are the technology adoption rate of Elderly Population, Urban Dwellers, and Young Adults in 1988?
VE.A: Elderly Population's technology adoption rate is {22.91} %, Urban Dwellers's technology adoption rate is {23.87} %, Young Adults's technology adoption rate is {17.38} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Technology Adoption Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum technology adoption rate is {0.20} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Technology Adoption Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum technology adoption rate is {100.00} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Technology Adoption Rate level recorded for Elderly Population?
What is the lowest Technology Adoption Rate level recorded for Elderly Population?
EVJ.A: Elderly Population's lowest recorded level is approximately {14.69} % in {1990}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Technology Adoption Rate?
SC.A: The average total technology adoption rate is {136.83} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate exceed 143.54 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate fall between 125.70 and 138.93 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate go below 121.08 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1995, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 1990 and 2001?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between 1992 and 1995 was {lower} than between 1990 and 2001.

NC.Q: Between 1995 and 2004, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 1994 and 1995?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between 1995 and 2004 was {higher} than between 1994 and 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1993, did the total Technology Adoption Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 1992?
NC.A: The change in total technology adoption rate between 1987 and 1993 was {smaller} than between 1991 and 1992.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2000, did the total Technology Adoption Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 1996?
NC.A: The change in total technology adoption rate between 1997 and 2000 was {larger} than between 1995 and 1996.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Urban Dwellers} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Young Adults, Families, Students, Elderly Population, Rural Communities, Urban Dwellers}.
